title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in despite multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Payment using Visa ending 1234 failed even with sufficient balance.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section.

title: Incorrect Billing Address
description: Customer updated billing address but system still shows old address.

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Mobile app crashes immediately on Android 13.

title: Refund Not Processed
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago but has not received it.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on registered phone.

title: Unable to Update Profile Picture
description: Customer gets 'Upload failed' error while updating profile picture.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal
description: Customer cannot enable auto-renewal as the toggle is disabled.

title: Missing Order Confirmation Email
description: Customer placed an order but no confirmation email was received.

title: Delayed Shipping
description: Order has been in 'Processing' state for more than 10 days.

title: Coupon Code Not Working
description: Customer unable to apply discount code 'SAVE20' at checkout.

title: Order Cancelation Request
description: Customer wants to cancel an order placed yesterday but option is not available.

title: Website Loading Slowly
description: Customer reports that the website takes more than 20 seconds to load on broadband.

title: Account Deactivation Error
description: Customer attempted to deactivate account but system shows an error message.
